summary: Completed comprehensive testing of new interview assistant features: keyboard shortcuts, OpenAI Whisper transcription, and session export functionality. Backend APIs 95% functional, frontend UI features working correctly with minor Whisper integration issue.

flaky_endpoints.symptoms: Returns 520 error instead of expected 500 with test data
flaky_endpoints.workaround: Endpoint exists but may have OpenAI API key or service configuration issues

ui_bugs.issue: Whisper toggle switch selector not found in automated test, but visible in UI

passed_tests: Backend health checks and core API endpoints (19/20 tests passed)
Session export JSON format - returns session data with Q&A pairs
Session export Markdown format - returns formatted markdown content
Keyboard shortcuts: Ctrl+Enter to submit questions works correctly
Keyboard shortcuts: Escape key activates Stealth Mode successfully
Keyboard shortcuts: Ctrl+M toggles microphone (registered, requires user permission)
Keyboard shortcuts tooltip displays all shortcuts (Ctrl+Enter, Ctrl+M, Ctrl+Shift+C, Esc)
Whisper toggle switch appears in Live Interview page UI
Export dropdown menu appears in Session History page with JSON and Markdown options
Export functionality triggers file downloads with success notifications
Stealth mode activation, minimization, and exit functionality
AI answer generation with all keyboard shortcuts integrated
Session History page displays sessions with export and continue options
Live Interview page loads with all new UI elements (Whisper toggle, keyboard hints)
Question input field accepts text and responds to keyboard shortcuts
Answer generation and display with copy functionality
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix Whisper transcription endpoint (/api/transcribe) - currently returning 520 error, likely due to OpenAI API configuration or service availability issues. All other features working correctly.
